analysis.description:
EdxToken.release (/unique_contracts/0x0ef4bd1e9baa163d410b31d47bd4e9ebe7dfda1c.sol#661-670) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _releaseTime == 0

EdxToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0ef4bd1e9baa163d410b31d47bd4e9ebe7dfda1c.sol#334-335)
EdxToken.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0ef4bd1e9baa163d410b31d47bd4e9ebe7dfda1c.sol#331-334)
EdxToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x0ef4bd1e9baa163d410b31d47bd4e9ebe7dfda1c.sol#334)
